entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 9:39 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 11.
